name: 2024 8th International Conference on Structural and Civil Engineering
content: Publication: Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. Accepted and registered papers will be published in the E3S Web of Conferences(ISSN: 2267-1242), which will be indexed by Scopus, CPCI (Web of Science), CAS, DOAJ, EBSCO, ProQuest, et al.
